string-array.item: Philip Humphrey "Phil" Dunphy (Ty Burrell) is a Real Estate Agent. He is the husband of Claire and father of three children Haley, Alex and Luke. He has a childlike attitude and acts more like a friend than a parent to his son.

Gloria Marie Delgado-Pritchett (née Ramirez) (Sofia Vergara) is the much younger Colombian wife of Jay. She is a housewife and a former hairdresser and taxi driver. She appears to be vociferous and takes her Colombian heritage seriously, unlike Manny.
Cameron Scott "Cam" Tucker (Eric Stonestreet) is the one with many jobs and grew up with his family on a farm. He can be emotional at times.
